Sentece: N-desmethylmethsuximide was the principal substance detected in plasma and had the following pharmacokinetic values: accumulation half-life, 49.7 hours; time to steady state, 10.4 days; elimination half-life, 72.2 hours; therapeutic range of plasma concentration, 10 to 30 mg per liter.
Title: Methsuximide for complex partial seizures: efficacy, toxicity, clinical pharmacology, and drug interactions.
Name: Methsuximide

Sentece: The metabolite accounted for 40% of the overall elimination of methsuximide, and the half-life of the metabolite (15 hr) was much greater than that of the parent drug (1--3.5 hr).
Title: Pharmacokinetics of methsuximide and a major metabolite in dogs.
Name: Methsuximide
